title: Is there any statistical evidence that listening to classical music makes you smarter? - Quora

response.answer_text: Having retired from my orchestral career, I now pursue a hobby as author and performer "Reverend Watt deFalk." I remember it was around 2008 or so when medical ministers maintained Mozart's music manifests magical mind-massaging muons miraculously multiplying moppets' mighty mental mastery. So far a time orchestras often had to perform with a near-constant gurgling and shrieking of tiny toad-brained tots brought there by their parents to undergo their smartuffuckayshun. Only a few years later did the medicos admit they'd been hurlin' heapin' helpin's a-horse-hocky on our heads.
